list-view-config.query-construct:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX dukecv: <http://vivo.duke.edu/vivo/ontology/duke-cv-extension>
construct { ?subject ?property ?dukePastPositionObj . ?dukePastPositionObj a dukecv:DukePastPosition . ?dukePastPositionObj rdfs:label ?dukePastPositionLabel .
#?dukePastPositionObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . #?dateTimeInterval core:start ?dateTimeStartValue . #?dateTimeStartValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeStart .
#?dukePastPositionObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . #?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . #?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd .
}
where { ?subject ?property ?dukePastPositionObj . ?dukePastPositionObj a dukecv:DukePastPosition . ?dukePastPositionObj rdfs:label ?dukePastPositionLabel.
#?dukePastPositionObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . #?dateTimeInterval core:start ?dateTimeStartValue . #?dateTimeStartValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeStart .
#?dukePastPositionObj core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . #?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . #?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd . }
